> [leftside](#comment_197_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): A system is rolled by two axises, its stupid members and its smart leader.If someone keeps forking as many persimmons as possible, he will definitely find out one which is ripe and soft.That persimmon will be forked and smashed by him. [...]

Not neccessarily true.  He has a right to say whatever he wants.  It's the individuals duty to decide whether to listen or turn the channel (as it were), not an outside party that decides what's good for people.  I agree that a private company can do what it wishes with servers they own.  So if he want's to keep going, he needs to find another platform.  People are free to join cults if they wish as well, as long as they are not harming anyone against their will.  Neither should a sysadmin delete someone unless they violate TOS
